    Research Overview

    "Your beliefs become your thoughts,
    your thoughts become your words,
    your words become your actions,
    your actions become your habits,
    your habits become your values,
    and your values become your destiny."

    attributed to Gandhi

    Hi there ðŸ‘‹ I am Do-Hyeon Lee from South KoreaðŸ‡°ðŸ‡·, a Research Officer for National Defense. I am currently assigned to the Defense AI Center, a subsidiary of the Agency for Defense Development. After earning my B.S. degree in Mathematics from POSTECH in February 2022, I have been dedicated to developing cutting-edge intelligent weapon systems, particularly focusing on anti-submarine and subterranean operations. I am currently preparing for graduate school to further deepen and expand my research.

    My research aims to develop a comprehensive formal framework to understand the mind, behavior, and brain of humans and animals. This framework seeks to explain, predict, and control various mental phenomena. By doing so, I aim to understand puzzling phenomena such as consciousness & hypnosis and contribute to the development of theory-driven human-level intelligent machines. For more information, please refer to the RESEARCH page.
